trans-unit.source: Provides information about the workflow template (that is, the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.Workflow.SPWorkflowTemplate</c>) that is represented by a node in **Server Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 介绍由“服务器资源管理器”中的节点表示的工作流模板（即 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.Workflow.SPWorkflowTemplate</c>）。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve an <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IWorkflowTemplateNodeInfo> object from the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations%2A> property of each <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode> that represents a workflow template.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IWorkflowTemplateNodeInfo>对象<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations%2A>每个属性<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode>表示工作流模板。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extending the SharePoint Connections Node in Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-connections-node-in-server-explorer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展服务器资源管理器中的 SharePoint 连接节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-connections-node-in-server-explorer.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of the workflow template.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作流模板的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the workflow template.
